summary: This is a spell that will change you to become Dragon Lord .
descriptionHtml:
Do you bored with werewolf and vampire ? 
Why only vampire and werewolf has transformation and what become our main character Dragonborn ? 
This is your answer Dragonborn Transformation \" Dragon Lord \" 

Dragon Lord Transformation has 2 type Warrior and Mage type just choose one because you can\'t mix them .

Description
===========

Now you can change anytime no restriction time limit and you can revert back anytime .

When you change to Dragon Lord you will have a new power and status :

* This is Dragon Lord Warrior type :

1. Sneaking now will provide you invincibility and regenerate health much faster

2. Now you can regenerate health in combat 

3. More HP , Magic , and Stamina 

4. Can walk in the water 

5. When you change you will have 2 spell ( bound weapon ) , Your Right hand spell conjures  Dragon Sword Right Casting the right hand spell will allow you to summon a secondary sword for your Left hand (dual wield) with new effect and enchantment . Equipping the Dragon Sword will grant the player a new Voice spell \" Thousand Sword Spell Attack \" .

6. Your left hand spell conjures Dragon Crossbow that shot Bolt Dragonrend . Equipping Dragon Crossbow gives you a new voice spell  \" Revert Form \" that will change you back .

7. New effect for the Dragon Sword so now you can deal more damage to Dragon .

Location
========

* You can find the spell inside Whiterun Stable  ( house ) in Ancient Chest .

REQUIREMENT
=============

- Latest Patch and Dawnguard 

Install
=======
You can either download this mod with the Nexus mod manager or download the files and extract into the Skyrim data folder. Be sure to check the tick box in your data files section on the Skyrim launcher.

Uninstall
=========

Delete Dragon Lord ESP 
Delete Meshes / Dragon Bone Mage Armor
Delete Meshes / swordframe
Delete texture / Dragon Bone Mage Armor
Delete sound /fx / swordframe
Delete scripts / DragonDualWield.pex,DragonEquipBoundBow.pex,DragonLordMagic.pex,DragonLordSound.pex
,DragonLordSwap.pex,DragonShout.pex,swordattack3.pex,swordattackrange
.pex,swordflame2.pex,swordflamequest.pex,swrodflame.pex


* Dragon Lord Warrior Alt *
=========================

Just changing Bound Sword to Bound Invisible fist and changing voice spell into Dragon Lord Fireball .
Just overwrite the Main file Dragon Lord Warrior .


==========================================================================================

* This is Dragon Lord Mage type :

1. Sneaking now will provide you invincibility and regenerate health much faster

2. Now you can regenerate health in combat 

3. More HP , Magic , and Stamina 

4. Can walk in the water 

5. Now you will have 2 destruction spell ( Fireblast and Frostblast ) and has a chance to disarm .

6. Your Voice spell now will conjure Dragon Hammer with new effect and enchantment ( Power attack will cause stagger and has 3 enchantment fire , frost , and storm ) . 

7. When you still conjure Dragon Hammer and you want to use destruction spell again you must sheathe you Dragon Hammer first ( just push \"R\" ) then click voice spell ( just push \" Z \" ) .

8. When you still conjure Dragon Hammer you can use Special Block ( just BLOCK ) that will push away your enemy .

9.. And when you conjure Dragon Hammer you will have a new Voice Spell \" Revert Back \" .

Location
========

* You can find the spell inside Whiterun Stable ( house ) in Ancient Chest .

REQUIREMENT
=============

- Latest Patch and Dawnguard 

Install
=======
You can either download this mod with the Nexus mod manager or download the files and extract into the Skyrim data folder. Be sure to check the tick box in your data files section on the Skyrim launcher.

Uninstall
=========

Delete Dragon Lord ESP 
Delete Meshes / Dragon Bone Mage Armor
Delete texture / Dragon Bone Mage Armor
Delete Meshes / weapon / Dragonhammer
Delete texture / weapon / Dragonhammer
Delete scripts/ DragonDualWield.pex,DragonEquipBoundBow.pex,DragonLordMagic.pex,
DragonLordSound.pex,DragonLordSwap.pex,DragonShout.pex,DragonSpeed.pex,
DragonVoiceSwap.pex,EquipDragonShout.pex,EquipDragonSpell.pex,UnequipDragonAxe.pex



Credits
=======

- Natterforme ( original armor \" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19291 \" ) , This all thanks to Natterforme to give me permission . Not all people will give permission so easy to use their mod .

- Kgorilla ( original Sword Spell \" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19547 \" )

-TheMalfazar ( original Hammer \" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16760 \" )

- Bethesda for Skyrim and CK

- Skyrim Nexus 

- Zigurd


* Note : don\'t mix together Dragon Lord Warrior type with Dragon Lord Mage type

Licensing/Legal
===============

You need to contact The Owner The Mod it self . 

Have FUN and Thank You for your attention .
author: MingPaulus
